title: IntelliPHP
intelliphp.inlineSuggestionsEnabled.desc: Enables or disables AI inline code suggestions. Enabled by default.
intelliphp.releasenotes.title: About ...
capabilities.virtualWorkspaces.descripti: In virtual workspaces, composer packages can't be installed or updated.
capabilities.untrustedWorkspaces.descrip: The extension may require workspace trust to use 'php' 3rd party tool, or to navigate to PHP documentation website, or to navigate to the product website.
